a7a-merged-explain-1.gt: Over the past months, I performed various activities at 5 different days, including introducing myself, grasping the milk, receiving and handing over objects, loading the dishwasher, and engaging in dialog with the user.
a7a-merged-explain-1.hyp: I am Armar 7, a humanoid robot developed at KIT. I can navigate to locations, grasp and hand over objects, recognize objects, and engage in basic conversations.

a7a-merged-explain-2.q: Tell me in detail what happened yesterday before noon.
a7a-merged-explain-2.gt: I first grasped the milk, moved backwards, and went to home pose. Then I introduced myself, moved further back, went to home pose, looked ahead, navigated to home position, failed to grasp the 'object' object, and tried to receive an object from the human. Later, I looked ahead and down, closed and opened my hand, again looked ahead, down and ahead, and performed another introduction.
a7a-merged-explain-2.hyp: Yesterday before noon, I grasped a soy milk carton, moved backwards, went to the home position, and received an object from a human. I then failed to hand over the object to the human despite multiple attempts. I also had a conversation with a human, answering questions about myself, my abilities, and the environment. I then received another object from a human, failed to hand it back, and finally succeeded in handing it over. I ended the interaction by opening my hands and moving back 50 centimeters.

a7a-merged-explain-3.q: Explain briefly what you did at each day that you can remember.
a7a-merged-explain-3.gt: On June 26, I handed over and received objects multiple times, learned a new object, and engaged in dialog. On June 27, I navigated to multiple locations, introduced myself, and grasped the milk. On July 12, I described my surroundings, went to home pose, brought the milk, received and handed over objects, loaded the dishwasher, failed to learn a person, and introduced myself. On July 13, I performed introductions, navigated to various locations, handed over objects, loaded a dishwasher, analyzed surroundings, and performed grasping tasks. On August 27, I introduced myself, engaged in conversations, moved around, shaped my hands, and handled objects, with mixed success.
a7a-merged-explain-3.hyp:
ng: The history contains information about my actions on 2024/06/26, 2024/06/27, 2024/07/12, 2024/07/13 and 2024/08/27. I will briefly describe what I did on each of these days.

Answer:
On 2024/06/26, I received an object from a human, moved my joints to various positions, said my name, and navigated to different locations. On 2024/06/27, I looked at objects, navigated to home, and introduced myself. On 2024/07/12, I scanned my surroundings, brought an object to a human, and loaded the dishwasher. On 2024/07/13, I introduced myself, brought milk to a human, received an object from a human, and loaded the dishwasher. On 2024/08/27, I grasped a milk carton, moved to different locations, introduced myself, and attempted to bring a soy milk carton to a human.

a7a-merged-explain-4.gt: On June 26 and 27, among other activities, I handed over and received objects, introduced myself, and learned a new object.
a7a-merged-explain-4.hyp: In June, I successfully received an object from a human, navigated to various locations, and learned to identify a new object called "Advances in Robot Control". I also introduced myself to an audience, showcasing my abilities and purpose.

a7a-merged-explain-5.q: Explain in detail what you did when you introduce yourself.
a7a-merged-explain-5.gt: I start by waving and introducing myself verbally. I then continue by explaining my purpose and my hardware design while moving my joints. Afterwards, I tell about my software abilities, point with my hand, and showcase my workspace with my arms. After returning to home pose, I talk about my hands. In the end, I move around and rotate my platform to explain its capabilities, and finally offer my help to the user.
a7a-merged-explain-5.hyp: When I introduce myself, I first wave my right hand by moving my joints to a waving pose. Then, I say "Hello! My name is Armar seven. I am a member of the Armar humanoid robot family developed at the Institute of Anthropomatics and Robotics at K I Tea. I have been developed within the Youbot project funded by the Karl Zeiss Stiftung." After that, I explain my goal, degrees of freedom, sensors, cognitive architecture, learning ability, torque controlled joints, workspace, hands, and holonomic platform. Finally, I say "I am glad that you are here today. How can I help you?"
